message.content:
1. Patients were interviewed post operatively.
2. The interviews were conducted at 30 minutes, 2 hours, 24 hours, and 48 hours post operatively.
3. The purpose of the interviews was to assess nausea.
4. The purpose of the interviews was to assess vomiting.
5. The purpose of the interviews was to assess anti-emetic use.
6. The purpose of the interviews was to assess dizziness.
7. The purpose of the interviews was to assess sore throat.
8. The purpose of the interviews was to assess headache.
9. The purpose of the interviews was to assess subjective general well being.

messages.content:
Statement: Patients were interviewed to assess nausea, vomiting, anti-emetic use, dizziness, sore throat, headache and subjective general well being at 30 minutes and 2, 24 and 48 hours post operatively.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
